trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Pleasant Grove
There were no other sightings in Pleasant Grove on or around June 30th 2013
Summary: Seen a starlike object traveling across the sky, it disapeared after aprox 30 seconds. saw 4 more.
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife, and I were outside on our deck having a cigarette, I often look at the sky, and when I looked up, I saw what looked like a slowly moving, bright star. It was moving in a straight line after watching it for about 30 seconds, it disapeared. There is not a cloud in the sky. My wife then says "look theres another one." I looked and saw it, traveling in the opposite direction of the first one. The second one travelled across the aky in a straight line, till it went out of site over mount Timpanogas. At this time my wife pointed out a third one, that also disapeared in the middle of the sky, then a fourth, and a fifth, that disapeared also.Upon seeing these lights, I was excited.
